name: @microflash/remarkability
description: Baseline CSS for text-heavy HTML documents

scripts.build:css: sass scss/remarkability.scss dist/remarkability.css && sass scss/remarkability.global.scss dist/remarkability.global.css
scripts.build:minify: cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/remarkability.min.css dist/remarkability.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/remarkability.global.min.css dist/remarkability.global.css
scripts.dev:clean: shx rm -rf .sitecache && shx mkdir .sitecache && shx rm -rf docs && shx mkdir docs

author: Naiyer Asif
